paragraphs.text:
%md From the file cities.csv, find the following:
  • Number of cities with altitude more than 25
  • List of cities starting with letter 'N'
  • Map the data to the Cities class defined below and write them to the XAP grid.

msg.data:
From the file cities.csv, find the following:

  • Number of cities with altitude more than 25
  • List of cities starting with letter 'N'
  • Map the data to the Cities class defined below and write them to the XAP grid.
